PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-03912019-04-29,  FIN,  GAC,  ,  , 
ActCustoms Tariff
SubjectOrder Amending the United States Surtax Order (Other Goods)
PrecisORDER AMENDING THE UNITED STATES SURTAX ORDER (OTHER GOODS) in order to remove boats from the list of goods subject to surtaxes which will eliminate a financial burden on Canadian companies and individuals importing these goods from the U.S., mitigating the negative domestic impact of surtaxes on the Canadian marine industry, boat dealers, and individual importers.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0111 Publication Date: 2019-05-15
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Order Amending the United States Surtax Order (Other Goods)
precis: ORDER AMENDING THE UNITED STATES SURTAX ORDER (OTHER GOODS) in order to remove boats from the list of goods subject to surtaxes which will eliminate a financial burden on Canadian companies and individuals importing these goods from the U.S., mitigating the negative domestic impact of surtaxes on the Canadian marine industry, boat dealers, and individual importers.
